Class BookCollection

java.lang.Object
BookCollection
public class BookCollection extends Object
This class represents a collection of books.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookCollection(Book[] books)
    Creates a new BookCollection object with the specified array of books.
